--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, syed Anwaruddin <s_thoda@y...> wrote:
> Hi All,
> 
> I want to call a SHELL script from JUNIT. This SHELL
> Script will execute server code. 
> 
> Could anyone help me in resolving this.

Same way as you would call shell script from any Java code you can 
call from your JUnit Tests. What are you trying to archive? May be 
you can test classes of server code and you would not need to call 
shell? Writing Tests for all server code, may be except main(), will 
have enough coverage to be happy.
